entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 10:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: WNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
